item.title: HOW TO: View your WordPress Website on iPhone or Android Mobiles
item.description: WordPress is a very comprehensive all-round tool for websites – and its not just for blogs. If you’re starting out with WordPress and need your site to look smooth on a mobile phone like the iPhone or iPad or any Android mobile then you’ll need a plugin for this. The best plugin for WordPress that handles any mobile device is easily WPtouch iPhone Theme. Once the plugin is installed and activated its working for you straight away.

item.title: How to make your website mobile
item.description: Smart phones are driving the usage of mobile internet and that’s not just the growth in mobile apps. Having a mobile version of your website or a mobile web app is becoming critical as your customers and potential new business use mobile search to hunt for any business. There are 3 easy steps to get your website ready for the mobile internet: Make your website mobile now Assess your mobile customer’s needs Improve your mobile customer experience to generate leads Make your website mobile today It’s easy for any brand or business to enable a mobile version of your website.

item.title: How to use Competitions & Social Media to grow your mobile marketing
item.description: Running competitions using social media is a good way for brands and businesses to create welcome visitors and friends to their sites. You can now take that competition mobile using mobile apps, games or mobile websites and you don’t have to use SMS. Using Social Media to get your customers discovering you on their mobile Your marketing messages on social media sites like Twitter and Facebook can direct existing customers to discover your mobile website or to download a mobile app.
